It is incredibly dangerous and potentially fatal to swallow powdered glass.  While it may not always result in an immediate death, the sharp edges can cause severe internal damage to the mouth, esophagus, stomach, and intestines. This can lead to internal bleeding, infection, and organ failure. 

Please remember, swallowing anything other than food and drink can be incredibly harmful.  If you or someone you know has ingested powdered glass, seek immediate medical attention.

This isn't something to take lightly. If you ever encounter powdered glass, treat it with extreme caution and keep it well out of reach of children.
